welcome_message_body: "Welcome to New Castle, the charming city known for its historic landmarks and picturesque views. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this beautiful place has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beaver Falls Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Beaver Falls Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Butler County - Kenny Scholter Field Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Butler County - Kenny Scholter Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Youngstown Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Youngstown Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
